channel.description: Local File Systems and Swap Topics File system benefits, categories, and types Ext3/Ext4, XFS, VFAT, and ISO9660 File system administration commandset Mount and unmount file systems manually and persistently Determine and use UUID Apply and use file system label Monitor file system and directory usage Create and mount different types of local file systems in partitions Create, mount, and resize Ext4 and XFS file systems in LVM Understand, create, and activate swap in partitions and LVM RHCSA Objectives: 30.
